name: Hermetic Wiper TG Process Patterns
description: Detects process execution patterns found in intrusions related to the Hermetic Wiper malware attacks against Ukraine in February 2022
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\policydefinitions\\postgresql.exe OR process.command_line:(*CSIDL_SYSTEM_DRIVE\\temp\\sys.tmp* OR *\ 1>\ \\\\127.0.0.1\\ADMIN$\\__16*) OR (process.command_line:*powershell\ \-c\ * AND process.command_line:*\\comsvcs.dll\ MiniDump\ * AND process.command_line:*\\winupd.log\ full*))`
